ygData.subject: RE: Smiths of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: I like this idea alot.  If it became widespread, it would once and for all shut the mouths of the assholes out there trying to tell you what you should charge
ygData.messageBody:
I like this idea alot. If it became widespread, it would once and for all
shut the mouths of the assholes out there trying to tell you what you should
charge them for banded. Lately, I've been harassed by people saying (lying
actually) that the going rate for banded is now 1pp per AC and getting real
upset when I tell them no. The other source of misinformation comes to
these people when they buy a banded gorget for 2-3pp from the wannabee
smiths that never get there skill much past 50 (you people on E Marr near
Freeport know who I am talking about). There are perhaps 5 of us really
active in smithing on E Marr and I know 2 of the other people for sure.
I'll try to get in touch with them and see what they think. The prices
esposed on the site are about 1 to 2pp higher than I charge now (5pp per
sheet needed to make an item, 15pp for cloaks).

Haniel the ForgeMaster, E Marr


> Date: 13 Oct 1999 16:23:00 -0000
> From: madoc_ab_owain@...
> Subject: Smiths of Norrath
>
> I saw the following site promoted on EQVault:
> http://home.earthlink.net/~sblack9/Blacksmiths.htm
>
> The author makes many good points about keeping costs in line
> with the effort needed to attain the skill level. I remember an
> earlier attempt at a trade guild on E'ci that also promoted
> "price fixing" but eventually failed. This site at least allows
> you to "find" smiths on your server and place orders via email,
> so no more hunting around the various zones trying to drum up business.
>
> What do you, as fellow smiths, think of the idea? If you aren't
> already on board, will you sign up?
>
> This list has been dead too long, let's stir up some discussion!
>
> Araman of E'ci
> 17th level Paladin
> Skill 142 smith
